alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 2:34PM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches, sleet accumulations up to a half inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Arkansas, northeast Louisiana and central, north central, northwest and west central Mississippi. * WHEN...Tonight through Monday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on dangerous road conditions and the potential for power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Mississippi can be obtained by visiting mdottraffic.com, dotd.la.gov in Louisiana and idrivearkansas.com in Arkansas.
